articles.title: How the Mavericks fell from world champions to the team nobody wanted to join - SB Nation
articles.description: In 2011 the Dallas Mavericks were on top of the world. A team in the truest sense of the word, veteran role players bolstered the stars. Dallas beat the Miam...
